content.text: Hi! My name is [user 1 name]. I'm a navy brat and I've been to 16 schools in 12 years.
Oh, wow! That must have been hard. I've only been to two schools.
It was a bit, but I made some great friends along the way. I think it also helped me become more adaptable and flexible.
That's a good point. I know I'm not very good at change.
Well, I'm sure you can learn to be better at it. It just takes time.
Thanks. I'm trying!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I play the violin. I've been playing since I was 8 years old.
Oh, that's cool! I used to play the piano when I was younger, but I quit when I was 10.
Why did you quit?
I don't know. I guess I just lost interest.
That's too bad. It's a beautiful instrument.
I know. I regret it sometimes.
Well, you could always start up again.
I might! I do miss playing.
You should! It's a great way to relax.
I know. I'll think about it.
Good! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go kayaking at the lake on weekends. It's a great way to relax and spend some time in nature.
That sounds really nice. I've never been kayaking before, but it sounds like it would be fun.
It is! You should definitely try it sometime.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
